an5.137:4.1: “Mendicants, these five sleep little at night, staying mostly awake.
an5.137:4.3: A woman longing for a man.
an5.137:4.4: A man longing for a woman.
an5.137:4.5: A thief longing for their loot.
an5.137:4.6: A king busy with his duties.
an5.137:4.7: A mendicant longing for freedom from attachment.
an5.137:4.8: These five sleep little at night, staying mostly awake.”
